data.title: THE SETTLERS Rise of an Empire History Edition
data.text:
windows Minimum

OS: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS

Processor: 64-bit CPU

Memory: 2 GB RAM

Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 11–compliant card with Shader Model 4.0 or higher

Storage: 8 GB available space

Directx: Version 9.0

Network: Broadband Internet connection

Sound card: DirectX 11-compliant sound card

Additional notes: * Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

windows Recommended

OS: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS

Processor: 64-bit CPU

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 11–compliant card with Shader Model 4.0 or higher

Storage: 8 GB available space

Directx: Version 9.0

Sound card: DirectX 11-compliant sound card

Master an Incredible Roster of Playable Characters in Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero

Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO is taking the legendary Action/Fighting gameplay of the popular Budokai Tenkaichi series and brings it to a completely new height of intensity. That is why you should get ready to better understand how to master the incredible roster of playable characters in Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero each coming with their very own signature abilities, combo moves and unique fighting techniques…
